QuestData.Title: Stocking Up on Supplies
QuestData.Description:
Provisioner Jin'hake managed to recover some other supplies from the shipwreck.
I want you to see if he has anything you could use before we move to stop these rituals.
QuestData.LogDescription: Purchase any item from Provisioner Jin'hake and sell any of your items to him.
QuestData.RewardText:
I hope you have what you need.
Throg found this bag nearby and thought you might have use of it.

Objectives.Objective: Any item purchased from Provisioner Jin'hake
Any item sold to Provisioner Jin'hake
